title: OVERCURRENT PROTECTION
fullText:
All IES cabling shall be protected against overcurrent in accordance with AS/NZS 3000.

Where overcurrent protection for the cabling to the IES is not provided by other overcurrent protection, the main switch (inverter supply) shall be a circuit-breaker with rating suitable to protect all cabling up to the IES.

NOTE: Overcurrent protection of the cable needs to take into account fault currents that may be sourced from either the main supply or the IES output.
